article_title: Government Programs Have Become One Big Scammer Fraud Fest

article_metadata.description: Rampant fraud has become pervasive in government programs, and yet instead of fixing that problem the president and Democrats demand we give those programs even more taxpayer money.
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews
